#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int i,n,cnt,val,t,mn=1e9,mx=0;
    cin>>n>>cnt;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
        cin>>val;
        mx=max(val,mx);
        mn=min(mn,val);
    }
    for(i=0;i<cnt;i++){
        cin>>val;
        if((val>=mn)&&(val<=mx)){
            cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
        }else{
            cout<<"No"<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
